name: 11 More
description:
Short reaction-based game made for Wonderjam 4.

You play as a samurai who needs to defeat 11 last enemies . The gameplay is fast-paced and pretty fun. When the timer reaches zero you must press attack as fast as you can to win. But after every enemy difficulty increases (if you don't want to , you can press E at the 1 level to enable easy mode)

This is my first time uploading something and if you have some problems , just write it in comments section , i will try to solve it .

Any feedback appreciated !!!

Art and programming by me 

All sound from https://freesound.org/
